alert.note: Alert for East Turnagain Arm (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 07 at 2:57PM AKST until December 08 at 1:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting to 30 mph. Visibility as low as one half mile at times. * WHERE...East Turnagain Arm. * WHEN...Until 1 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will develop along east Turnagain Arm by late this afternoon. Snowfall rates of one inch per hour are possible this evening before the snow tapers off. The combination of snowfall, gusty winds, and the dry nature of the snow may significantly reduce visibility along area roadways.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
